attributes.action: We want parliament to propose a motion of no confidence in the speaker
attributes.background: According to Parliament's own web site 'the speaker must remain politically impartial at all times' the current speaker John Bercow has publically demonstrated his political views over Brexit and a vote of no confidence in his ability to continue in the capacity of the speaker needs to be proposed

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that call for someone to be given or to lose their job. This includes petitions calling for a vote of no confidence in an individual.
